授業目的:
The goal of this course is to build oral communication skills. Students will improve their speaking and listening ability through a variety of activities, including listening and note-taking, making recordings, shadowing, and giving presentations. By the end of the semester students will improve in these areas:
· Active listening skills
· Basic conversation skills
· Basic online discussion skills
· Pronunciation and speaking speed
· Presenting
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
